src:
女星肉餅臉瘦成V字臉！　法令紋爬滿臉網驚「你哪位」
01 Nov 2019, 09:02 by 陳立妍
韓國女星金宣兒因演出韓劇《我叫金三順》爆紅，近年以夯劇《有品位的她》的心機女看護一角，再攀事業高峰。不過，45歲的金宣兒9月底參加新劇《秘密精品店》記者會才被發現臉部僵硬、充滿膠感，今（1日）為拍攝雜誌出國時，又被拍到法令紋明顯、嬸味十足，看起來遠比實際年齡還要顯老。
金宣兒在新劇《秘密精品店》化身復仇女神，出身貧寒的她因擅於交際，獲得總裁賞識進入上流社會，為獲得更多的權錢勢力，不惜利用深愛自己的男人展開權力鬥爭。但9月底該劇舉辦記者會，當天化了大濃妝的金宣兒先是被發現臉部僵硬、招牌肉肉臉瘦成「V字臉」，之後又爆出經紀公司要求審核公關宣傳照，疑似「進廠維修」的傳言不逕而走。


金宣兒看到鏡頭開心比出愛心手勢賣萌。（翻攝自xsportnews）

事實上，金宣兒14年前為了拍攝《我叫金三順》曾增重10公斤，未料戲拍完後體重竟不減反增，讓她經歷一段痛苦的減重時期。隨著新劇《秘密精品店》將在本月中播畢，今（1日）金宣兒為拍攝雜誌，從仁川機場準備出發前往印尼峇里島，心情大好的她看到鏡頭俏皮擺出愛心手勢，但藏不住的法令紋卻讓她看來老態畢現，網友看了照片後也忍不住紛紛驚訝留言：「這是金宣兒？」「臉怪怪的」「說沒整我不信」。


金宣兒為拍攝《我叫金三順》，曾在2個月內增重10公斤，近期出席新劇記者會俏臉卻變得十分僵硬。（翻攝自Naver、東方IC）

更新時間｜2019.11.01 09:26
text:
The actress meat pie face is thin into a V-face! The law pattern crawls across the face and stuns "Which one are you?"
01 Nov 2019, 09:02 by Chen Lizhen
Korean actress Kim Xuan-er has been smashing the red for the Korean drama "My name is Jin Sanshun". In recent years, she has taken a look at the singer-song "The Lady with the taste" and climbed the career peak. However, the 45-year-old Jin Xuaner was found at the press conference of the new drama "Secret Boutique" at the end of September. He was found to have a stiff face and a sense of gel. When he went abroad for the filming magazine on the 1st, he was photographed with a clear and savory pattern. It looks far older than the actual age.
Jin Xuaner in the new drama "Secret Boutique" incarnates the goddess of vengeance. She is born in poverty. She is acquainted with communication and gains the appreciation of the president into the upper class. In order to gain more power and power, she will use the man who loves her to carry out the power struggle. However, at the end of September, the drama held a press conference. On the same day, Jin Xuaner, who had made a big makeup, was found to have a stiff face and a thin face of the signature face. After that, he broke out the brokerage company’s request for a public relations photocopy. The rumors of entering the factory for maintenance are not gone.


Jin Xuaner saw the lens happy than the love gesture to sell Meng. (Revolving from xsportnews)

In fact, Jin Xuaner had gained 10 kilograms in order to shoot "My name is Jin Sanshun" 14 years ago. Unexpectedly, after the filming, the weight did not decrease and she experienced a period of painful weight loss. With the new drama "Secret Boutique" will be broadcasted this month, today (1st) Jin Xuaner is a shooting magazine, ready to leave for Incheon Airport to Bali, Indonesia, she is in a good mood, she sees the camera playful gestures. However, the legal pattern that could not be hidden made her look old. After watching the photos, the netizens couldn’t help but be surprised to say: "Is this Kim Jong-il?" "Face of the face" "I don't believe that I don't believe it."


Jin Xuaner is shooting "My name is Jin Sanshun". It has gained 10 kilograms in 2 months. The recent appearance of the new drama reporters has become very rigid. (Reflected from Naver, Oriental IC)

Update time|2019.11.01 09:26
